Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

I am greatly sad over the happening of minime. He was a great frined and a 
great role player. His brother emailed me and a few others priatly. Minime 
said that we kept him going. If not for this rpg that he would have done this 
a long time ago. I hope that makes you proud to be apart of soemthing that 
could give a person like minime hope. I have given the idea to yanshosh to 
make a day of silence in memory of Minime through out the rpg for one day. If 
some dont agree with this thats fine. But me and dachande have agreed to do 
this ourselves no matter what. The date will be set for our day of silence  
some time soon.

--part1_cf.1c8efc5.27ab2a25_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
